message.body: What time is your surgery Thursday
Wow that's late who gp taking you
Ok whew will you be done and do you have to take off of work the next day
Its about two and a half hours for the appt. I should be home around 5:00 and im coming to your house to go to sleep bec my house will have the dog abd cat bothering me
I don't have to take off work the next day but I did bec my follow up appt is at 10:30. I won't get back to work until 12-1, no point going to work for two hours
Does your work know your getting it done
My manager knows and and coworkers know. ... my one oogie manager knows
Are they saying anything that you are taking these days off
No i get paid days off every year for my dr office... I just got new days in August and haven't used them yet.
